text:
Hi everyone, for some reason there ‘background-layer’-classes  set for sections on an clients account.
Don’t know if it is a new feature or got accidentally activated at some point.
With that the sections always get a background-image (with gradient) set instead of a regular background-color (as selected for the section).
Is there a way to change that back to the normal behaviour?
Did anyone have the same issue? Or a hint on where to find a plausible solution?
Didn’t find any documentation on this – and this is causing issues on the website atm.

Kind regards,
Alvin
can you share a link to a page where this is happening?

Hi <@U03AKL6Q1B2>. Thanks for asking.
For example on <http://xorlab.com|xorlab.com> (all pages on that domain).
All dnd-section get a class like `dnd_area-row-10-background-layers`’added (generated class) – as soon a background-color is set via editor or defined in the saved-section.
